DOC.brief_summary: Stress urinary incontinence affect nearly 30 million woman worldwide main goal surgical treatment stop urinary incontinence ( urinary leakage ) occur physical activity , coughing , sneeze , etc.Patients study operation improve urinary incontinence symptom . This involve insert mesh sling help support urethra ( tube lead bladder ) . During operation , study doctor use tension-free vaginal obturator system . The study include woman diagnose Stress Urinary Incontinence complete family .
DOC.brief_title: A Clinical Evaluation Tension-Free Vaginal Tape Obturator System For Treatment Stress Urinary Incontinence ( Urinary Leakage )
DOC.criteria: Patient objective demonstrable sign stress urinary incontinence ( SUI ) , include patient ISD . Objective test include : standing stress test , urodynamics evaluation , pad test . Patient age 18 old . Patient hysterectomy , tubal ligation otherwise incapable pregnancy , negative pregnancy test prior study entry decide cease childbearing . Patient agree participate study , include completion studyrelated procedure evaluation , document agreement sign IRB/ECapproved informed consent . Patient associate suspected neurological disease . Patient anticoagulation therapy . Patient receive investigational drug device past 60 day . For patient URP measurement select site : Patient active lesion present injury perineum urethra.Patient urethral obstruction . Patient unreduced cystocele > Stage 1 . ( Reduction prolapse prior URP test require . ) Reduction Cystocele ( applicable ) . Patients seat semifowler 's position head bed 4060 degree . Carefully place half speculum vagina , reduce prolapse less stage 1 . Be careful extend elongate vaginal length . The half speculum must place pressure emphasis posterior apical area . Anterior wall pressure urethral pressure must avoid time . The subject active infection upon urine dipstick analysis , define ≥+1 leukocyte ≥+1 nitrate ( Must reschedule appointment UTI resolve . )
